review: Dr Divya was courteous and shared all relevant information before treatment. During treatment she made sure I was comfortable and didn’t face any issues or discomfort. Will recommend for anyone seeking a dental check up and are hesitant to do so.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Dental Crowns,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review: Dr. Divya is an amazing doctor. I have visited her for several dental issues from root canal to tooth extractions over the years. She has an amazing pair of hands and is very gentle. Procedures are expertly performed and I have never experienced any pain or complications. Doctor has a very good and caring demeanour. I particularly appreciate how she explains every step and makes sure you are comfortable. I trust her and would highly recommend her.
reply_text: thanks a lot Divya! It is such a positive rendezvous with you. hope you stay healthy!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Our 2girls let only Dr. Divya to treat her teeth. She is so calm and love that my girls feel comfortable with her only.

Best dentist for kids as well as adults. Today, i got my teeth scaling done from her and I understood why.
She treats so carefully and gently as if we are fragile bone china.

Two thumbs up!!!!
reply_text: lovely! as lovely as you are ! the kids always make my day without fail! bless you!!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ***** **** ****** *** **** ** * **** ** ***** ** ********** *** *** **********  I entered the clinic and I heard a series of issues that my son could possibly be facing.  Infact I wasn’t even explained the issues regarding dental health in detail and she wanted to start off the procedure. I think consent for a procedure should be mandatory.
reply_text:
we are deeply sorry to hear about your experience. we hope to serve you better next time. Unfortunately dental negligence makes us powerless to provide in the best interest of the child. Hope the little one gets the best oral care soon.
Inconvenience is deeply regretted.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Divya is very good and effective.  I referred her to a friend as well.  But the front office people at Dr. Soni's Dental Clinic did not respect the appointment I had made for my friend in which I specifically asked for Dr. Divya at the same time as my own appointment.  They tried to assign my friend to one of the other doctors at the clinic and made my friend wait 30 minutes unnecessarily.
reply_text: Thank you for your trust.i am really sorry for the inconvenience caused to you from this end.I assure you personally that it will not happen again in future.it is definitely a lesson for us and we assure a better responsible behavior at the front desk.Regards, Divya
